interactivity.requirements: You must have seen or permanently missed the following Events: Seen " The Girl with the Dragon Tattoo " from Io Ichimonji Seen " Blackout " from Tsuneyo Tojo Seen " Where the Sidewalk Ends " from Yumi Yamaguchi

progression.synopsis: Sensei takes up Yuki 's invitation to talk about Yumi over dinner. At Tojo Ramen, Tsuneyo has already corrected any misunderstandings that might have arisen from Yuki overhearing a previous conversation . Sensei asks why Yuki wants to check up on Yumi, and although Yuki admits that she wasn't a great parent, it's still nice to know that her daughter hasn't made the same mistakes as she did at that age. Sensei tells Yuki about Yumi's job interview , about Chika and Chinami , and about Yumi's TV resale "business". Sensei asks if Yuki wants to see Yumi again — Yuki says that she'd be happy to do so if Yumi wanted it, but she isn't asking Sensei to make it happen, and there's no guarantee that Yuki won't relapse into the same problems that alienated them to begin with.

changelog: This Event was added in Update .15p1.
